content:
Q: When are some of the conditions when my maidâ€™s hospital & surgical costs are not claimable under Maid Protect360 PRO?
A: The Policy excludes pre-existing medical conditions and also communicable disease of the maid. If the injury is pre-existing, or due to suicide, pregnancy, influence of drugs etc, such conditions will also not be claimable under maid insurance.
questions: What are the exclusions for hospital costs under Maid Protect360 PRO?
Are pre-existing medical conditions covered by Maid Protect360 PRO?
Can I claim for my maid's surgical costs if she has a communicable disease?
What types of injuries are not claimable under Maid Protect360 PRO?
Is pregnancy considered a claimable condition under Maid Protect360 PRO?
What happens if my maid's injury is due to drug influence?
Are there any specific conditions that would prevent me from claiming hospital costs?
Can I claim for my maid's medical expenses if she attempted suicide?
What should I know about claimable conditions for maid insurance?
How does Maid Protect360 PRO handle claims for pre-existing conditions?
